itunes:title: Episode 994 - Special Guest ’Justified’ Actor Nick Searcy
title: Episode 994 - Special Guest ’Justified’ Actor Nick Searcy
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: ‘The Shape of Water’ and ‘Justified’ actor Nick Searcy joins the show to talk about making a film with The Daily Wire, what working in Hollywood as a conservative is like, the time Sean Penn got mad at him after the famously liberal actor found out Nick ...
itunes:summary:
‘The Shape of Water’ and ‘Justified’ actor Nick Searcy joins the show to talk about making a film with The Daily Wire, what working in Hollywood as a conservative is like, the time Sean Penn got mad at him after the famously liberal actor found out Nick was conservative, and what Nick saw when he was at the U.S. Capitol on January 6th.
